issue.message: Must be one or more of: Context.BIND_AUTO_CREATE, Context.BIND_DEBUG_UNBIND, Context.BIND_NOT_FOREGROUND, Context.BIND_ABOVE_CLIENT, Context.BIND_ALLOW_OOM_MANAGEMENT, Context.BIND_WAIVE_PRIORITY, Context.BIND_IMPORTANT, Context.BIND_ADJUST_WITH_ACTIVITY
issue.explanation: Ensures that when parameter in a method only allows a specific set of constants, calls obey those rules.
